title: PM commends PAF for foiling terrorist attack in Mianwali
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 4 (APP):Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Saturday commended the Pakistan Air Force for thwarting the terrorist attack on PAF Training Base in Mianwali.
“The valiant Pakistan Air Force has once again proven its mettle by thwarting a cowardly terrorist attack in Mianwali,” the prime minister wrote on X, formerly twitter.
The valiant Pakistan Air Force has once again proven its mettle by thwarting a cowardly terrorist attack in Mianwali. Any attempt to undermine our security will meet with unwavering resistance. The nation stands with you and we salute your courage and resolve.
— Anwaar ul Haq Kakar (@anwaar_kakar) November 4, 2023
He said any attempt to undermine the security would meet with unwavering resistance. “The nation stands with you and we salute your courage and resolve.”
